thread.title: County health groups, law enforcement comes out againgst Issue 3
thread.title_full: County health groups, law enforcement comes out againgst Issue 3 - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: County health groups, law enforcement comes out againgst Issue 3
text: With marijuana on the Ohio ballot and early voting underway, Montgomery County health agencies and law enforcement sounded a late alarm against recreational marijuana – which has received far less attention than other aspects of Issue 3 including medical use and the controversial language to limit the number of growers. Marijuana has no place in making Montgomery County a " healthy, safe and thriving community, " said Jeffrey Cooper, the county’s health commissioner, during a Thursday morning news conference attended by about 30 people downtown at Public Health - Dayton & Montgomery County.
